title: Majo no Tabitabi (Dub)
alternative_title: The Journey of Elaina, 魔女の旅々
description: Once upon a time, there was a witch named Elaina, who set off on a journey across the world. Along the way, she would meet all kinds of people, from a country full of witches to a giant in love with his own muscles—but with each meeting, Elaina would become a small part of their story, and her own world would get a little bit bigger.
